      • AbstractResourceService

        public AbstractResourceService(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> partitionUrls,

                               org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework curator,
                               EventService notifications,
                               java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> idSupplier,
                               java.lang.Boolean async)
        Create an AbstractResourceService with the given producer
        Parameters:
        partitionUrls - the partition URLs
        producer - the kafka producer
        curator - the zookeeper curator
        notifications - the event service
        idSupplier - a supplier of new identifiers
        async - write cached resources asynchronously if true, synchronously if false

    • Method Detail

      • write

        protected abstract java.lang.Boolean write(IRI identifier,
                                           java.util.stream.Stream<? extends Quad> delete,
                                           java.util.stream.Stream<? extends Quad> add,
                                           java.time.Instant time,
                                           java.lang.Boolean async)
        Write to the persistence layer
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        delete - the quads to delete
        add - the quads to add
        time - the time the resource is written
        async - true if the cache is written asynchronously; false otherwise
        Returns:
        true if the write was successful; false otherwise
